text: Poststreptococcal Glomerulonephritis Usually children about 2-4 weeks after group A beta hemolytic strep infection Type Il hypersensitivity reaction Antistreptococcal antibodies (ASO) l Serum C3 levels “PSG = PS3” ® Type 3 Hypersensitivity ® Occurs 3 weeks after infxn ® ASO (3 letters) ® Decrease C3
